entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
